title: Kasa — Apartment Rental Platform
description: A complete React-based SPA created during the OpenClassrooms formation (P6). Fully responsive with dynamic routing and UI components.

title: ArgentBank — Online Banking Application
description: A banking dashboard built with React and Redux (OpenClassrooms P10). Includes authentication, user accounts, and API integration.

title: Mes Resto — Restaurant SaaS Builder
description: A dynamic multi-restaurant SaaS platform where users can create their own restaurant website.

title: Solene Dev Studio OS — Web App System
description: A personal iPadOS-inspired web operating system built with React. Includes apps, layout system, dock, and page architecture.
